pr_title: Fix #4522 - override write method in LoggingStream

timeline.message:
Fix #4522 - override write method in LoggingStream

Signed-off-by: tvallin <thibault.vallin@oracle.com>

timeline.bodyHTML:
is there any objection to rewrite it like this:

        @Override
        public void write(byte[] ba, int off, int len) throws IOException {
            if ((off | len | ba.length - (len + off) | off + len) < 0) {
                throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException();
            }
            if ((baos.size() + len) <= maxEntitySize) {
                baos.write(ba, off, len);
            } 
            out.write(ba, off, len);
        }

?
timeline.author: senivam

replies.bodyText: No objection, thanks for the tips !
replies.author: tvallin
